channel.title: events on BASE Alliance
channel.description: Recent content in events on BASE Alliance

item.title: Presentation materials of 'The 4th Workshop Basing Blockchain' now available
item.description: As a part of workshop series of BASE alliance, “The 4th Workshop Basing Blockchain” held online. The materials used at the workshop available n the following links.

item.title: <CANCELLED> Announcing: The 4th Workshop Basing Blockchain
item.description: This event cancelled due to COVID-19 situation As a part of workshop series of BASE alliance, “The 4th Workshop Basing Blockchain” will be held at Keio University, Mita Campus, on March 8th, 2020. Please refer to the event detail page in Japanese

item.title: Event: Interop 2019 Keynote on Blockchain evolution from the Internet's point of view
item.description: BASE Alliance’s steering committee jointly presented a keynote session at Interop Tokyo 2019. Please refer to the Japanese page for the detail

item.title: Presentation materials of 'The 3rd Workshop Basing Blockchain' now available
item.description: As a part of workshop series of BASE alliance, “The 3rd Workshop Basing Blockchain” will be held at Institute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo, on February 15th, 2019. The materials used at the workshop can be downloadble in the following links.

item.title: Announcing: The 3rd Workshop Basing Blockchain
item.description: As a part of workshop series of BASE alliance, “The 3rd Workshop Basing Blockchain” will be held at Institute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo, on February 15th, 2019. Please refer to the event detail page in Japanese

item.title: Session on 'Blockchain technology now and future' at Keio University SFC ORF
item.description: Keio Research Institute at SFC is organizing a yearly open event “Open Research Forum (ORF)” for showcasing various research activities at Keio Shonan Fujisawa Campus (SFC). The location and the date of the events at Roppongi Tokyo Midtown on November 22nd and 23rd. One of the BASE Alliance member, Keio Blockchain Lab at Keio Research Institute at SFC will run a panel discussion based session specialized on cross chain technologies. If you have interest, please come to the session.

item.title: Presentation material of 'The 2nd Workshop Basing Blockchain' now available
item.description: BASE Alliance and Keio University co-hosted a workshop on ongoing work on academic research on blockchain on June 23rd, 2018 at Mita Campus of Keio University.

item.title: Announcing: The 2nd Workshop Basing Blockchain
item.description: As the part of workshop series of BASE alliance, “The 2nd Workshop Basing Blockchain” will be held at Keio Mita Campus on Saturday June 23rd, 2018. Please refer to the event detail page in Japanese

item.title: Presentation materials of 'The 1st Workshop Basing Blockchain' now available
item.description: BASE Alliance and the University of Tokyo co-hosted a workshop on ongoing work on academic research on blockchain on January 19th, 2018 at the University of Tokyo.

item.title: Announcing: The 1st Workshop Basing Blockchain
item.description: BASE alliance plan to run a series of workshops introducing academic research work, as a follow-up to the event “Future of Blockchain Technology” on July 24th, 2017 which jointly produced by Keio Blockchain Lab and Matsuura Lab at The Insitute of Industrial Science, The University of Tokyo. As the first workshop of this series, “The 1st Workshop Basing Blockchain” will be held at The Insitute of Industrial Science at The University of Tokyo.
